name: SCAPE CRAFT
description:
Video Gameplay/Tutorial

Platform-construction based Game with heavy levels.

Controls:

  • HorizontalMovement: A-D or Arrows
  • Jump: Space
  • Select item Inventory: 1-3
  • Select Preview item Inventory: 1-3
  • Instanciate Materia: Enter

Credits:

  • Alex Casanova
  • Lucas Rodriguez
  • Lluís Bayer
